title: 3 and Out - Cam is Shot; Belichick's AB Plan; Lamar Jackson Context; NFL Week 2 Preview; Chip Kelly's Robbing UCLA; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Cam is Shot; Belichick's AB Plan; Lamar Jackson Context; NFL Week 2 Preview; Chip Kelly's Robbing UCLA; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, Middlekauff reacts to Cam and the Panthers dropping to 0-2 after a TNF loss to the Bucs, why Cam's days as Carolina's starter are numbered, why Belichick would bother signing the exhausting Antonio Brown, why Lamar Jackson's Week 1 explosion against the Dolphins needs some context, why Chip Kelly is stealing money from UCLA at this point. He also makes his Week 2 NFL picks, and answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
